TopicTitle: Where can i find nav lights

Articles.Content: ive been looking all over the forums and add-on sections but i cant find the mod i saw it the other day could some give me a link.
Looky at this here thread in the general add-on section: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/14100-Landing-Lights
Ha there link to the download page is the ksp forum home page!

There is an aviation light pack; http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/16925-PLUGIN-PART-0-16-Aviation-Lights-v1-0

There is also a headlamp in the KSPBigTrak collection.

Does anyone else find that lights, even when off, can introduce a load of lag?
Waht keys do you use to turn on,off the lights???? for aviation pack?
The 'o' key. It also says that is has to be in the active stage.

Waht keys do you use to turn on,off the lights???? for aviation pack?

'o' as Tommy521 says, and also 'p'. I think its 'o' for nav and 'p' for strobe/beacon. Its in the docs, just above teh download link. I've just been making my Kerbals a night club with this light pack; http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/19152-video-Kerbals-go-Clubbing-%28nightclub-yes-rockets-no%29
